title.description: The title of the block see in Site Editor

pointer.description: JSON schema pointer, i.e., the JSON schema path (for example: #/properties/firstName) in which the form block inputs should be validated against.

accept.description: By default, the upload input only supports image and PDF format files. If you want to customize it, you can use the format type you want by following this pattern: *.TYPEFILE. Learn more about the accept field.
